publicwhip.spmotion: S2M-2765 Roseanna Cunningham: Smoking, Health and Social Care (Scotland) Bill - Order of Consideration at Stage 2â€”That the Health Committee considers the Smoking, Health and Social Care (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: sections 9 to 36, schedules 2 and 3, sections 1 to 5, schedule 1, sections 6 to 8, section 37 and the long title.
